thread.title: J.K. Rowling is a proud dog mom and wants everyone to know it
thread.title_full: J.K. Rowling is a proud dog mom and wants everyone to know it

author: April Hautea
title: J.K. Rowling is a proud dog mom and wants everyone to know it
text:
J.K. Rowling isn't just a famous author or human rights advocate. She's also a dog mom.
SEE ALSO: J.K. Rowling's Twitter feud with Piers Morgan just took an unexpected twist
Yesterday, in between tweeting gems of wisdom and battling writer's block, Rowling shared a proud dog mom moment with her Twitter followers.
I've spent all day wrestling with the same damn paragraph, but this afternoon my dog was rated on @dog_rates and that's everything üê∂‚≠êÔ∏è https://t.co/OO0KeAtSGz
‚Äî J.K. Rowling (@jk_rowling) February 20, 2017
Rowling was responding to a WeRateDogs tweet that rated her adorable West Highland terrier, Bront√´. The pup scored an impressive 13/10.
This is Bronte. She's fairly h*ckin aerodynamic. Also patiently waiting for mom to make her a main character. 13/10 would be an honor to pet pic.twitter.com/w1MQWO2PET
‚Äî WeRateDogs‚Ñ¢ (@dog_rates) February 20, 2017
When a fan asked the author about Bront√´'s name, Rowling responded with the enthusiasm of a mother talking about her child.
@dog_rates which Bront√´ is she named for, @jk_rowling ?
‚Äî Michael Henning (@killminusnine) February 20, 2017
She responded:
In my mind, Anne (controversial, I know), but one of my kids was only recociled to the name on the basis that it was short for Brontosaurus. https://t.co/AScKk0ahBt
‚Äî J.K. Rowling (@jk_rowling) February 20, 2017
She's hardly ever called 'Bront√´', though. The very opposite of She-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named, she's got about a hundred nicknames.
‚Äî J.K. Rowling (@jk_rowling) February 20, 2017
Whether named after a long-necked dinosaur or an English novelist, the story behind Bront√´'s name is sweet.
Rowling has tweeted pictures pictures of her and Bront√´, often while she's writing.
When your dog decides you've written enough for one day. pic.twitter.com/aDE9Av0z4E
‚Äî J.K. Rowling (@jk_rowling) January 29, 2016
It's great to know that Rowling has such a faithful writing partner to keep her on track and motivated.
A little end of chapter congratulation. pic.twitter.com/A9K8a5x7Dx
‚Äî J.K. Rowling (@jk_rowling) December 20, 2016
BONUS: J.K. Rowling weighs in hard on the Donald Trump/Meryl Streep feud
